## FVM
Fantom Virtual Machine<br>

### Example output of executed VM in debug mode
```
Loading 12 : 0a ff 00
Loading 20 : 0f 0a 00
Opcode: 12 0a ff 00 , ProgramCounter: 0 , NextProgramCounter: 1
r0:00000000 r1:00000000 r2:00000000 r3:00000000 r4:00000000 r5:00000000 r6:00000000 r7:00000000 r8:00000000 r9:00000000 r10:000000ff r11:00000000 r12:00000000 r13:00000000 r14:00000000 r15:00000000 
Opcode: 20 0f 0a 00 , ProgramCounter: 1 , NextProgramCounter: 2
r0:00000000 r1:00000000 r2:00000000 r3:00000000 r4:00000000 r5:00000000 r6:00000000 r7:00000000 r8:00000000 r9:00000000 r10:000000ff r11:00000000 r12:00000000 r13:00000000 r14:00000000 r15:000000ff 
Program ended with exit code: 0
```
